blocks.name: cdchr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the group of Dirichlet characters.
blocks.origin: const class cdchr { DChr }

blocks.name: diff.cdchr.s
diff.cdchr.c
diff.cdchr.w
df-dchr
blocks.content: The group of Dirichlet characters ` mod n ` is the set of monoid homomorphisms from ` ZZ / n ZZ ` to the multiplicative monoid of the complex numbers, equipped with the group operation of pointwise multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-dchr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cdchr, cmpt(s0, cn, csb(s1, cfv(czn, cv(s0)), csb(s3, crab(s2, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(s1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cfv(cui, cv(s1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s2))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s3)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(s3), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-dchr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ DChr =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶[(Z/nZ ` s0)/ s1][{ s2 ‚àà((mulGrp ` s1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` s1)\(Unit ` s1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s2 } / s3]{ <(Base ` ndx), s3 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(s3 √ó s3))> })
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: dchrval
blocks.content: Value of the group of Dirichlet characters. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)))))), diffsc(s0, c4))

  syl5eq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)))), cfv(cdchr, c2), w0)
  fvmptd2(hs0, cdchr, c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)))), cn, csb(hs1, cfv(czn, cv(hs0)), csb(hs2, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs2)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))))), universe, w0)
  df-dchr(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  csbied(hs1, cfv(czn, cv(hs0)), csb(hs2, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs2)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)))), universe, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  fvexd(czn, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  csbied(hs2, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs2)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)))), universe, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wcel(crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), universe))
  rabex(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)))

  preq12d(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs2)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))), cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))))))

  opeq2d(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))))))

  sqxpeqd(cv(hs2), c1, wa(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))))))
  biimpar(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), c1))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs2), c1, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))))
  eqtr4d(c1, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, c3), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(c4, c5), csn(nat0)), cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, crab(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, c3), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(c4, c5), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), co(cfv(cmgp, c3), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), wss(cxp(cdif(c4, c5), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cfv(cmgp, c3), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))))

  sseq1d(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(s0), cxp(cdif(c4, c5), csn(nat0)), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(czn, cv(hs0)))))

thm dchrval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> })
  ‚ä£ c0 =(DChr ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Z/nZ ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Unit ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c3)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|((c4 \ c5)√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }), d(s0, c5))
  syl5eq(c0, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }, (DChr ` c2), w0)
  fvmptd2(hs0, cdchr, c2, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }, cn, [(Z/nZ ` hs0)/ hs1][{ s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 } / hs2]{ <(Base ` ndx), hs2 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(hs2 √ó hs2))> }, universe, w0)
  df-dchr(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  csbied(hs1, (Z/nZ ` hs0), [{ s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 } / hs2]{ <(Base ` ndx), hs2 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(hs2 √ó hs2))> }, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }, universe, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  fvexd(czn, hs0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  csbied(hs2, { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }, { <(Base ` ndx), hs2 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(hs2 √ó hs2))> }, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))> }, universe, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0)))
  a1i(((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0)), { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  rabex(s0, ((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld)), (((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0)
  ovex((mulGrp ` hs1), cmhm, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  preq12d(<(Base ` ndx), hs2 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(hs2 √ó hs2))>, <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1))>, (((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0))‚àß hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }))
  opeq2d((Base ` ndx), hs2, c1, (((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0))‚àß hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }))
  opeq2d((+ ` ndx), (oF(√ó)|`(hs2 √ó hs2)), (oF(√ó)|`(c1 √ó c1)), (((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0))‚àß hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }))
  reseq2d(oF(√ó), (hs2 √ó hs2), (c1 √ó c1), (((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0))‚àß hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }))
  sqxpeqd(hs2, c1, (((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0))‚àß hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }))
  biimpar(((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0)), hs2 = { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }, hs2 = c1)
  eqeq2d(hs2, c1, { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0)))
  eqtr4d(c1, { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` hs1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|(((Base ` hs1)\(Unit ` hs1))√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }, { s0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c3)[MndHom](mulGrp ` CCfld))|((c4 \ c5)√ó { 0 })‚äÜ s0 }, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 = c2)‚àß hs1 =(Z/nZ ` hs0)))

blocks.name: dchrelbas3
blocks.content: A Dirichlet character is a monoid homomorphism from the multiplicative monoid on ` Z/nZ ` to the multiplicative monoid of ` CC ` , which is zero off the group of units of ` Z/nZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrelbasd
blocks.content: A Dirichlet character is a monoid homomorphism from the multiplicative monoid on ` Z/nZ ` to the multiplicative monoid of ` CC ` , which is zero off the group of units of ` Z/nZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for a Dirichlet character. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dchrrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdchr, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  sseldi(c2, cn, cdm(cdchr), wcel(c0, c1))
  dmmptss(hs0, cdchr, cn, csb(hs1, cfv(czn, cv(hs0)), csb(hs2, crab(hs3, co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cui, cv(hs1))), csn(nat0)), cv(hs3))), cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(hs2)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cmul), cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))))))
  df-dchr(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs2)
  nsyl2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cdchr)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  n0i(c0, c1)
  syl(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(cdchr))), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(c3, emptycls))
  syl5eq(c3, emptycls, cfv(cdchr, c2), wn(wcel(c2, cdm(cdchr))))
  ndmfv(c2, cdchr)
  3eqtr4g(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, emptycls), wceq(c3, emptycls))
  fveq2(c3, emptycls, cbs)
  base0()
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}

blocks.name: dchrmhm
blocks.content: A Dirichlet character is a monoid homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dchrmhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdchr, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czn, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)))
  simpld(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cui, c1)), csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)))
  ibi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wss(cxp(cdif(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cui, c1)), csn(nat0)), cv(hs0))))
  dchrelbas(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cui, c1), c2, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c1))
  dchrrcl(cv(hs0), c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)))
}

blocks.name: dchrzrh1
blocks.content: Value of a Dirichlet character at one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dchrzrh1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, nat1)), nat1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdchr, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(czn, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, cfv(c1, nat1)), nat1, cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c4)), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1, nat1), cfv(cur, c4), w0)
  4syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), cfv(cur, c4)), wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, ccrg), wcel(c4, crg))
  nnnn0d(c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cn), wcel(c0, c5))
  dchrrcl(c0, c5, c3, c2)
  zncrng(c3, c4)
  crngring(c4)
  zrh1(c4, c1, cfv(cur, c4))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cur, c4)), nat1), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c4), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  sseldi(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c4), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c5, w0)
  dchrmhm(c5, c4, c2, c3)
  mhm0(c0, cfv(cmgp, c4), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cfv(cur, c4), nat1)
  ringidval(cfv(cur, c4), cfv(cmgp, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c4))
  ringidval(nat1, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfld1()
}

} = {

thm dchrmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, cof(cmul), c2), co(c0, cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c6, c6)), c2), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, cres(cof(cmul), cxp(c6, c6)), w0)

blocks.name: dchrabl
blocks.content: The set of Dirichlet characters is an Abelian group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrghm
blocks.content: A Dirichlet character restricted to the unit group of ` Z/nZ ` is a group homomorphism into the multiplicative group of nonzero complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dchrghm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdchr, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(czn, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cui, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cfv(cmgp, c6), cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cres(c0, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3), co(c2, cmhm, c3), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), co(c2, cmhm, c3)), wcel(cres(c0, c1), co(c2, cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), co(c2, cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c6), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c6))))
  sseldi(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c6), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c7, w0)
  dchrmhm(c7, c6, c4, c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c6))), wcel(c6, crg))
  unitsubm(c6, c1, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c6))
  resmhm(c0, cfv(cmgp, c6), cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), c1, c2)

blocks.name: dchrinv
blocks.content: The inverse of a Dirichlet character is the conjugate (which is also the multiplicative inverse, because the values of ` X ` are unimodular). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrabs2

thm dchrabs2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czn, c3))

  0le1()

  dchrabs(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cui, c5), wa(w0, wne(cfv(c0, c1), nat0)))

thm dchr1re(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(DChr ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Z/nZ ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñù))
  ffnd(c0, c1, cc, w0)
  dchrf(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Base ` c2), w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, w0, (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  pm2.61dane((c0 ` hs0), nat0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  syl6eqel((c0 ` hs0), cr, nat0, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)= 0))
  simpr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)= 0)
  0re()
  syl6eqel((c0 ` hs0), cr, nat1, ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)‚â† 0))
  dchr1(c0, hs0, c2, c3, c4, (Unit ` c4), ((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(c0 ` hs0)‚â† 0))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ` hs0)‚â† 0, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  biimpa((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (c0 ` hs0)‚â† 0, hs0 ‚àà(Unit ` c4))
  dchrn0(c0, hs0, (Unit ` c4), c2, c3, c4, (Base ` c2), c1, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  eqid((Unit ` c4))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c2))
  4syl(w0, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c2 ‚àà Abel, c2 ‚àà Grp)
  dchrabl(c3, c2)
  ablgrp(c2)
  grpidcl(c2, c0, (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  1re()
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, c1, cr)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: dchrpt
blocks.content: For any element other than 1, there is a Dirichlet character that is not one at the given element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrsum2
blocks.content: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of all the values of a Dirichlet character ` X ` is ` 0 ` if ` X ` is non-principal and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Part of Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dchrsum
blocks.content: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of all the values of a Dirichlet character ` X ` is ` 0 ` if ` X ` is non-principal and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Part of Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dchrsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cif(cfv(cphi, c3), nat0, wceq(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdchr, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czn, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(csu(s0, c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cif(cfv(cphi, c3), nat0, wceq(c1, c2)), csu(s0, cfv(cui, c5), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), w0)
  fsumss(s0, cfv(cui, c5), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cfv(cui, c5), c0))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wf(c1, c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  dchrf(c1, c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  sseli(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5), c0)
  unitss(cfv(cui, c5), c0, c5)
  ffvelrn(c1, c0, cc, cv(s0))
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cfv(cui, c5))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5)))))
  eldif(cv(s0), c0, cfv(cui, c5))
  impr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0))
  necon1bd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5)))
  biimpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5)))
  dchrn0(c1, cv(s0), cfv(cui, c5), c4, c3, c5, c6, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c6))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c3, cn))
  dchrrcl(c1, c6, c3, c4)
  znfi(c3, c0, c5)

blocks.name: dchrhash
blocks.content: There are exactly ` phi ( N ) ` Dirichlet characters modulo ` N ` . Part of Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), cfv(cphi, c0)))

  fsumcom(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cfv(czn, c0)), c1, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cc, cfv(cbs, cfv(czn, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(czn, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))

blocks.name: sumdchr
blocks.content: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of ` x ( A ) ` for fixed ` A ` and all ` x ` is ` 0 ` if ` A = 1 ` and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

thm sumdchr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), cif(cfv(cphi, c3), nat0, wceq(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdchr, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czn, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s0), c1)), cif(cfv(cphi, c3), nat0, wceq(c1, c2)), cif(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, wceq(c1, c2)), w0)
  sumdchr2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  ifeq1d(cfv(chash, c0), nat0, cfv(cphi, c3), w0, wceq(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(cphi, c3)), wcel(c3, cn))
  dchrhash(c3, c0, c4)
}

} = {

blocks.content: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of ` X ( a ) x. * Y ( a ) ` over all ` a ` is nonzero only when ` X = Y ` . Part of Theorem 6.5.2 of [Shapiro] p. 232. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà c0,((c1 ` s0)[√ó](* `(c2 ` s0))))= if(c1 = c2,(œÜ ` c3), 0))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(DChr ` c3)

  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c4)

blocks.name: sum2dchr
blocks.content: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of ` x ( A ) ` for fixed ` A ` and all ` x ` is ` 0 ` if ` A = 1 ` and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Part of Theorem 6.5.2 of [Shapiro] p. 232. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
